title: cultural_data_Napier_Museum
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.invis.napier.
Application Name: Napier Museum.
Number of Reviews: 25.00.
Application Description: Napier Museum is one of the oldest art and natural history museums in India. Set in the sprawling, lush museum grounds, this historic structure stands as a landmark in the city with its unique ornamentation and architecture. The museum is renowned for its fairly good collection of artistic, cultural and antique objects.Napier Museum App is an initiative of the Department of Museum and Zoos, Government of Kerala. This App will provide you with information regarding the artifacts of Napier Museum. The App along with Bluetooth Low Energy devices that are fixed inside the Museum bestows the visitors' details of the artifacts while visiting the Museum.Read moreCollapse.
